attributes.title: dOnT bAn TiKtOk
attributes.userName: trump is a ✨ l o s e r ✨
attributes.review: this app is absolutely awful!! while opening the app my cat flew out the window and hit my parnets windshield! he ended up shattering it and he climbed in and drove to dell taco for some freesh ahvacadoo. he brought me back a toenail and a turtle. i cant believe he didn’t get the fingernail and ferret package but whatever. my brother also got hit by a car but i pressed the rewind button and he’s ok now because a fairy from a tiktok comment saved him. 🧚🏻 t h a n k s 🧚🏻 soooo yeah you kinda just be salty cause we more powerful and we trying to free your son. hope you enjoy your last days as president and i hope you wish kanye well! have fun in the fruitbowl orange 🍊

attributes.title: Cheeto puff president🤮🤮✋🏻
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app. I opened the app and it immediately started glitching. I was absolutely disgusted when I saw a big wet Cheeto puff staring at me. I showed my grandma and she immediately started throwing up. She only has a few months left to live and when she saw that creature she started having a seizure and passed away. THIS APP CAUSES DEATH. And that’s not all, large men with suitcase invaded my house saying trump 2020 and kidnapped my mom. I haven’t seen her since. I DO NOT recommend downloading this app. Legend says once you download this app you will die three days later. So for my final words I would like to say Obama will always be my president. 💅😌

attributes.title: get a new weave bunker boy 🎃
attributes.review: The second i opened this app i immediately went brain dead. Toxic orange fumes began to rise through my pristine teak floorboards smelling like bunker boy’s rotting toupee. This caused my refrigerator to run 🏃‍♀️out of my house and i was left without my ACAB ben and jerry’s ice cream 😡. When I tried to delete the app smoke started pouring out of my trash can and created a hologram Trump 🙀He then proceeded to grab my birth certificate and rip it in half while shouting racial slurs. While I begged for mercy a Melanoma hologram appeared and began ripping apart my ikea furniture. Bullying is not a joke and Gabbie Hannah agrees with me. THESE ARE HIGH SCHOOL BULLIES!! We have to save Barron from this toxic household that attacks amazingly sturdy Swedish furniture.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible, this app took over my phone!!! It texted my loved ones and harassed my family😫 This app gave my phone a virus and deleted all my other apps which is so DISGRACEFUL I’m very VERY DISAPPOINTED because I thought I would be getting a decent app, but no! My privacy was violated and my children are scared because they think that I did something when it was this stupid app!! If you have children do NOT get this app and make sure they DON’T get it either or they will lose IQ points and fail their classes, I’m also convinced they stole my identity and used it to make fake accounts online, What ever you do, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: Periodt
attributes.review: You can do anything you out your mind to ✨🧚‍♀️💕just not this 💕🍃✨ do something useful in y’alls life and never mess with gen z ever again. You take down tik tok, we take down your crusty cheeto’s fanclub. Y’all really be saying all live matter, GIRL they do just not YOUR live. I think we can all agree that your just trying to take down tik tok cuz people on there can leak that cheeto’s nudes 🤡. Dont get me wrong people have options.. but this is just not it. I mean comeon, your app is at a 1.4😻 sis better just give up now before a war breaks, and who's fault will it be? Your “president”’s. This was never a threat,Im not able to do thus much power. But THEY can...

attributes.title: awful app.
attributes.review: this has to be one of the worst apps i’ve ever downloaded. it provides misinformation and says things that have clearly been proven wrong. i am shocked that this is even in the app store and i believe it should be taken down immediately. it was also the most glitchy app i have ever downloaded and was so hard to function. when i opened the app i saw a disturbing cheeto infront of my eyes. thankfully i had a america girl magazine to cover my eyes and i was safe from that awful incounter. words can’t describe how much i hate this app and i believe NO ONE should download it. thank you for reading my feedback and stan loona 😘✨🧚‍♀️👀💞🤩😼🙈🤪

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: This app turned my entire house and family to garbage. I now live in a garbage land because of this app. Please for the love of god take this app away, we have so many other people who have loving families that don’t deserve to get turned to trash. My world was turned to trash because of the horrible vibes and toxicity that Trump gives off, we should 100% kick him out of office and spare this country turning to trash. This app is slowly turning the world into trash, please do not download. Why would Trump do this to me and my family? Please spare yourselves and don’t download this app, I’d rate it 0 stars if I could but sadly that’s not an option...

attributes.title: Invasion of Privacy!
attributes.review: First of all, the front logo is just disgusting🤮 and messes up my home screens 📱whole athstetic 😡. Secondly, when I open it there’s an orange 🍊 looking man 👨‍🦳standing 🧍‍♂️there and he doesn’t look inviting at all! The Black power fist ✊🏽is appreciated tho!! Lastly they asked for my MOBILE PHONE NUMBER. I thought this was a NEWS app and not someone trying to STEAL my personal information! Going along with that you can’t go any farther in this forsaken app without giving it to them! Overall it was a waste of my time ⏰ to download such an app. Disappointed that App Store would endorse such an ugly, ill-designed, personal data breaching, app 😾.

attributes.title: Medal for the worst app
attributes.review: So i woke up to go on my daily run and i was so happy because i downloaded the best app there is this one of course i love my president 💕 but once i opened the app my whole perspective just gave up i was on the run and i started to throw up not because of me running but because how disgusting this app is i couldn't believe what was on here for shame even the dog was throwing up and I'm pretty sure 2 birds feel to the ground and died oh wait my bad it as actually 4 birds and one was a baby poor baby bird can you imagine it was his first time flying and he look down to see a view and this is what he got poor little creature

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: While I was going to the app I saw a picture of an ad of a naked girl saying I like turtles and it’s just very disturbing because one why is she naked and two we did ask! Another example on why this is horrible is because it’s really lagging and freezing and sometimes kicks me off the app. Another thing is that I saw another ad of a beer with the mustache it was disturbing because there was also a naked girl with a lion and what looked like a moldy sandwich and she was wearing a cape that looked like a foot. Another thing was that this gave me a virus on my other phone it was just really terrible, I really don’t recommend getting this app. :/
